official_title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Honolulu Harbor, Hawaii, to direct the Army Corps of Engineers to maintain a 23-foot depth in Kalihi Channel, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Modifies the navigation project for Honolulu Harbor, Hawaii, authorized by the River and Harbor Act of 1954, to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to maintain a 23-foot depth in the Kalihi Channel, Hawaii. Permits the State of Hawaii to construct a bridge over such channel.

titles.title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Honolulu Harbor, Hawaii, to direct the Army Corps of Engineers to maintain a 23-foot depth in Kalihi Channel, and for other purposes.
